Marco Polo wears European traveler’s attire, such as a wool or silk tunic.

The garden walls of Oakwood Grange form the background setting, and the gardens are lush with trees and vegetation.
Le Prince is using his single-lens camera to film Roundhay Garden Scene.
The single-lens cine camera by Louis Le Prince measures 576 mm x 275 mm x 430 mm and is made of wood, metal, glass, and brass (a copper-zinc alloy).
The Roundhay Garden Scene
Single-lens Cine Camera by Louis Le Prince
LPCCP Type-1 MkII <image_1>
